pages.text: Regular folk, rudimentary as they are, tend to use lava whenever they want to dispose of useless items. $(br2)Obviously, witches do not follow such practices, but rather proceed by throwing their trash inside lava filled cauldrons. $(br2)Not only it's much more practical, it also has the

advantage of not setting the witch on fire should it trip over the cauldron... $(br2)Additionally, you can also throw filled buckets to void their content. $(br2)$(o)Just... don't throw fireworks in, ok?
